text: Just buy this brand! I have tried all the rest and this one is the best for cooking, using it on skin and hair. Coconut is so good for you. Its the magic cure for everything. It has the good fat in it. Buy a book on the mirical of coconut oil and sit back and be amazed at what it can do for you and change your life. Study up on other oils for cooking and be prepared to be horrified! If your using it for skin or nails. This is the brand. Love love coconut oil!
